MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Kimberley Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have replaced two blown fuses at the local substation & have additional engineers on route to assist with additional repairs and we now expect your supply to be restored by Midday. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:43am on the 14th of April 2021.
